changeSet.createView: with a as ( select tzn_date,p.id,p.namefa plant,sellerid, seller,gdsname , target , case when instr(carname ,'انتينر')>0 then 'ريلی' else 'جاده اي' end car, nvl(sum(wazn),0) wazn,nvl(sum(tedad),0) tedad , gdscode from view_tozin_s t join tbl_tozin_plant p on p.id=substr(TOZINE_ID,1,1) where (substr(condition,1,1)=2) and (gdscode in (24 , 159 )) group by tzn_date, p.id,p.namefa,sellerid,seller,gdscode,gdsname ,target,case when instr(carname ,'انتينر')>0 then 'ريلی' else 'جاده اي' end) select a."TZN_DATE",a."ID",a."PLANT",a."SELLERID",a."SELLER",a."GDSNAME",a."TARGET",a."CAR",a."WAZN",a."TEDAD" , a."GDSCODE" from a right join TBL_TOZIN_PLANT on A.plant = TBL_TOZIN_PLANT.NAMEFA
